onGetPacket

public void onGetPacket(String packet)
Parses the packets received. Possible packets are "$R:int:int:" // send diceRoll "$M:int:int:" // Send a player's move "$T:text" // text message to the other player "$E:" // Ends the player's turn "$B:int:" // Sends a man on the bar "$L:" // Tells the other player they lost "$N:" //request for a new game "$Y:int:" //response for a reset request
